title: Real-life Context-Based Mobile Mathematics Learning Design: Strengthening Language Domain Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and basic job-related data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Providing a simulation environment applying mathematical thinking within office/administrative contexts familiar to working professionals, with VR/simulations enabling learning in near-authentic workspaces

learning_goals: Analyze real-world workplace data (document volume, task time, etc.) using mathematical tools and apply findings to decision-making processes.
Use mobile devices and measurement applications to accurately calculate required metrics in work contexts and compare/verify results.
Solve work-related mathematical problems (e.g., budget allocation, resource optimization) through collaboration, enhancing social negotiation skills with peers.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
